snippet: At the South by Southwest festival this year, historically a place of artistic idiosyncrasy, corporate logos were everywhere.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column observes that at the South by Southwest festival in Austin, Tex, historically a place of artistic idiosyncrasy, music labels were an afterthought and corporate logos were everywhere; points out new order evolved because when music moved into the cloud, not much revenue came with it.
lead_paragraph: At the South by Southwest festival this year, historically a place of artistic idiosyncrasy, corporate logos were everywhere.

headline.main: A New Model for Music: Big Bands, Big Brands
headline.print_headline: A New Model for Music: Big Bands, Big Brands

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
keywords.name: subject
